I had a 650 armor Malphite on my team yesterday. Good luck killing this with Last whisper. Another game I went tabi, double randuins, iceborn, deadmans with Nasus vs full AD team and could facetank turret and the whole enemy team. 
LW alone is not enough unless you have % armor ignore or true dmg.
LW is much better at killing targets with lots of bonus armor. It only starts sucking when the base armor is very high.

Tanks have high base armor.
But not bruisers or Ezreals building {{item:3025}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3047}}
Why don't they just restrict the item to melee champs? Even Riot agrees that it doesn't belong on ranged champs.

That's why adc were always known to build crit items to fight against tanks. They don't necessarily need armor shred at all if they deal 100% crit damage to tanks and other champs. However, I don't know the numbers for this so its possible armor stops crit somehow?

Yeah having it be less effective on ranged champions would help to curve ranged abuses of this item.

It's passive should be changed to this:

> UNIQUE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing the effectiveness of armor by 5% (2.5% for ranged champions) for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of 30%/15%.

It will no longer reduce armor, but it will create the same effect as just reducing it. That way, the debuff can at least affect melees and ranged differently as straight up reducing it would help out a marksman hitting the same without it.
Hmmm I'd also double the max stacks for ranged, so they can eventually reach the max damage still.  Otherwise it would be way too weak.

Belive me, the issue is not Lucian getting BC, he will stay a problem without that item.
He actually has a higher win with Trinity than with BC(https://euw.op.gg/champion/lucian/statistics/adc)

Trinity is a waste of gold and absolutely bullshit on him. 
His winrate is most likely higher with it because people build it when they are alredy snowballing so hard that they can afford it. 
They could basically build lich bane at that point and still win the game.
